CustomField.formula:
If(ISNULL(DATEVALUE(CreatedDate)),
(Date_Client_Load_Received__c - today() - 2*( floor((Date_Client_Load_Received__c - DATE(1985, 6, 24))/7)-floor((datevalue(CreatedDate) - DATE(1985, 6, 24))/7))),
(Date_Client_Load_Received__c - datevalue(CreatedDate)) - 2*(floor((Date_Client_Load_Received__c - DATE(1985, 6, 24))/7)-floor((datevalue(CreatedDate) - DATE(1985, 6, 24))/7)))
CustomField.label: Days to Client Load Received
